title: Script ID
content:
Hello,

Can anyone tell me the fonts from this logo, particularly the script? Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [tyler\_prize.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016124615/http:/typophile.com/files/tyler_prize.jpg) | 33.27 KB |
author: shannonrryan

comments.content:
feels like many of these characters are Vivaldi. But I can't say which version, or if there is one with alternates that would fit where the standards don't match, or if a secondary font/modifications are going on. perhaps someone more learned can elaborate.

edit -- the "z" actually looks to me like it's been turned upside-down and then had a tail added. The "P" seems like an "R" cut up... not sure about the "T".
